Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Choe Ha Thaek 
   Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of Choe Ha Thaek, former chief of the Oil-Painting Creative Group of the Mansudae Art Studio who is winner of Kim Il Sung Prize and people's artiste, expressing deep condolences over his death.

DPRK Delegation Leaves for 12th Meeting of UNCTAD 
   Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation led by Ri Myong San, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, left here today to participate in the 12th meeting of the UN Conference on Trade and Development to be held in Accra, Ghana.

Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Choe Ha Thaek
   Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Choe Ha Thaek, laureado con el "Premio Kim Il Sung", artista del Pueblo y ex jefe del Colectivo de Creacion de Pinturas al Oleo de la Casa de Creacion Mansudae, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.
